projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: The calculator just like in phones, with advanced maths functions like SIN, COS, TAN, etc.

projects.title: Clock
projects.description: The International Clock provides the time of many cities ( 95% of cities ) in the GMT timezone.

projects.title: CoinFlip
projects.description: This provides a fair way to choose between heads and tails when you don't have a coin!

projects.title: Color Picker
projects.description: The Color Picker, customised, lets you pick your colors, or some basic default colors if you are having some trouble choosing...

projects.title: Currency Convertor
projects.description: This currency tool helps you in converting currencies to another, because its a lot of trouble doing that yourself, most of the currencies are supported

projects.title: Dice Roll
projects.description: This simple tool rolls two die with random numbers from 1 - 6

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: Helps you build a custom strong password!

projects.title: Random Choice Picker
projects.description: Picks a random choice from the list of choices you enter.

projects.title: Temperature Convertor
projects.description: This basic tool helps you in converting celsius to fahrenheit or the vise-versa.

projects.title: Text Manipulation
projects.description: This is a text tool, with some few things, like, converting to uppercase, or lowercase, character counting, etc.

projects.title: TicTacToe
projects.description: Not a tool, this is a game played by many, it takes skill, go on, play!

projects.title: Weather Reporter
projects.description: Advanced weather reported for cities, type in the name of a city, press get weather, and there you go!

projects.title: Typing Test
projects.description: A simple 1 minute typing test with over 50+ random paragraphs and sentences, test your speed!

projects.title: Click The Box!
projects.description: A simple game where you have to click on the randomly spawning box which appears randomly in the screen everytime you click, score as much as you can in 60 seconds.

projects.title: 2048 Game
projects.description: A simple game which is meant to clone the original 2048daily game, hope you enjoy!

projects.title: English Dictionary
projects.description: A simple dictionary ( english ) which gives the meaning and an example of the given word.

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.description: A simple QR Code generator which generates custom QR Codes according to the entered value.

projects.title: Text To Speech
projects.description: An advanced tool with voice options which converts your text to speech with just a click of a button

projects.title: Net Speed Test
projects.description: A simple test which tells you your internet speed in MBPS

projects.title: Country Information
projects.description: This tool provides you basic information of countries like their continent, population, capital, etc.
More projects coming soon...
